org.apache.flink.runtime.operators.sort

类 UnilateralSortMerger.ThreadBase<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.operators.sort.UnilateralSortMerger.ThreadBase<E>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Runnable, Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
    直接已知子类:
    UnilateralSortMerger.ReadingThread, UnilateralSortMerger.SortingThread, UnilateralSortMerger.SpillingThread
    封闭类:
    UnilateralSortMerger<E>

    protected abstract static class UnilateralSortMerger.ThreadBase<E>
extends Thread
implements Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
    Base class for all working threads in this sort-merger. The specific threads for reading, sorting, spilling, merging, etc... extend this subclass.

    The threads are designed to terminate themselves when the task they are set up to do is completed. Further more, they terminate immediately when the shutdown() method is called.

    • 字段详细资料

      • queues

        protected final UnilateralSortMerger.CircularQueues<E> queues
        The queue of empty buffer that can be used for reading;

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ThreadBase

        protected ThreadBase(ExceptionHandler<IOException> exceptionHandler,
                     String name,
                     UnilateralSortMerger.CircularQueues<E> queues,
                     AbstractInvokable parentTask)
        Creates a new thread.
        参数:
        exceptionHandler - The exception handler to call for all exceptions.
        name - The name of the thread.
        queues - The queues used to pass buffers between the threads.
        parentTask - The task that started this thread. If non-null, it is used to register this thread.

    • 方法详细资料

      • run

        public void run()
        Implements exception handling and delegates to go().
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 Runnable
        覆盖:
        run 在类中 Thread

      • go

        protected abstract void go()
                    throws IOException
        Equivalent to the run() method.
        抛出:
        IOException - Exceptions that prohibit correct completion of the work may be thrown by the thread.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Checks whether this thread is still alive.
        返回:
        true, if the thread is alive, false otherwise.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Forces an immediate shutdown of the thread. Looses any state and all buffers that the thread is currently working on. This terminates cleanly for the JVM, but looses intermediate results.

      • internalHandleException

        protected final void internalHandleException(IOException ioex)
        Internally handles an exception and makes sure that this method returns without a problem.
        参数:
        ioex - The exception to handle.

      • uncaughtException

        public void uncaughtException(Thread t,
                              Throwable e)
        指定者:
        uncaughtException 在接口中 Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
